info: Default map required to play this modpack. Make sure to download before trying to play TolkienCraft II. Thank you for playing! -GO

description: Part 1 of 2, DLC to expand Middle-earth
info: Extra locations built for Middle-earth to increase your playing enjoyment. These are iconic locations from the books and movies with quests as well. -GO
